document_name: Order No. 2017-3581-MEADD-SG (National Steering Committee on climate risks and floods management)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MLI/2017/MLI-2017-10-24-Order No. 2017-3581-MEADD-SG (National Steering Committee on climate risks and floods management)_4dc05480f2cd83f13924f5a9cc6e4caf.pdf
document_description: This order creates the National Steering Committee, within the Ministry of the Environment, Sanitation and Sustainable Development, for the project "Climate risks and floods management in Mali" to preserve lives and goods. It establishes the compositions and functions of the Committee.
